Producer: Spike Lee, Robert Cicutto, Luigi Musini
Production Co: 40 Acres & A Mule Filmworks, RAI Cinema
Synopsis: During World War II, members of the U.S. Army's all-black division are stationed in the Tuscany region of Italy. Four of the soldiers (Derek Luke, Michael Ealy, Laz Alonso, Omar Benson Miller) become trapped behind enemy lines and separated from the rest of their unit after one of them risks his life to save an Italian boy.
Title: Miracle at St. Anna
